titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain digital camera lenses not exceeding 765.5 grams in weight.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/26/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain digital camera lenses not exceeding 765.5 grams in weight.
